member.name: M:Artemis.Extensions.Rpc.AddInLogInterceptor.UnaryServerHandler``2(``0,Grpc.Core.ServerCallContext,Grpc.Core.UnaryServerMethod{``0,``1})
member.summary: Server-side handler for intercepting and incoming unary call.
member.typeparam: Request message type for this method.
Response message type for this method.
member.param: The request value of the incoming invocation.
An instance of representing the context of the invocation.

A delegate that asynchronously proceeds with the invocation, calling the next interceptor in the chain, or the service request handler, in case of the last interceptor and return the response value of the RPC. The interceptor can choose to call it zero or more times at its discretion.
member.returns: A future representing the response value of the RPC. The interceptor can simply return the return value from the continuation intact, or an arbitrary response value as it sees fit.
